properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bino bianwa biefwe,
bino bianwa biefwe, aa
ee Baba yakanila Baba. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kuno mkate kwefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.
Eino fini yefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Eino sadaka yefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.
Buno bunyali bwoo papa,
khwakanile papa.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Chino chiraa chefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.
Chino chiraa chefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Eino emali yefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.
Buno butambi bwefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Kino milimo kiefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.
Buno bulamu bwefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Abano baraka bwefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.
Buno bukofu bwefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Abano basasi bwefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.
Abana abana bwefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Buno busime bwefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.
Buno busime bwefwe papa,
khwakanile papa.
